title: RILP (gene)
text:
Rab-interacting lysosomal protein is a <a href="protein">protein</a> that in humans is encoded by the "RILP" <a href="gene">gene</a>.
Function.
RILP, along with the GTPase RAB7 (MIM 602298), controls late endocytic transport.[supplied by OMIM]
Interactions.
RILP (gene) has been shown to <a href="Protein-protein%20interaction">interact</a> with <a href="RAB7A">RAB7A</a>.
